title: My Pixel 4a 5g has APN setting issues. I can't add or edit my settings. How do I enable changes?
content: I would like to see if my internet connection issues stem from my phones APN settings. I can't seem to add or edit what I currently have. I just got a new Pixel 4a 5g on the Visible network (Verizon's prepaid). There is no option to add APN's or to edit the APN that is on the SIM card. Please help.
